item.title: Angela Rayner sparks debate over ‘anti-Etonian prejudice’ amid ‘scum’ row
item.description: Deputy Labour leader Angela Rayner has sparked debate over “anti-Etonian prejudice” after her “scum” comment on Saturday night.
item.dc:creator: Elaine McCallig

item.title: Nicki Minaj’s ‘swollen testicle’ claims are going up in smoke - but she’s still got some controversial support
item.description: Nicki Minaj‘s claims that her cousin’s friend was left impotent after receiving the Covid-19 vaccine are going up in smoke - and she’s now resorting to some rather questionable commentators to back her claims.
item.dc:creator: Elaine McCallig

item.title: Lizzo looks Good As Hell in glam Covid-19 test selfie
item.description: Getting a Covid test is not a glamorous affair – unless you’re Lizzo.
item.dc:creator: Indy100 Staff

item.title: Another conservative anti-vax radio host has died of Covid-19
item.description: Another staunchly anti-vaccination radio host has died of Covid-19.
item.dc:creator: Danielle Sinay

item.title: Andrew Neil breaks silence over GB News turmoil - here’s how people responded
item.description: GB News chairman Andrew Neil has spoken out about the channel’s first month of broadcasting, amid a backlash over one of its presenters taking the knee and low viewing figures.
item.dc:creator: Liam O'Dell

item.title: The Queen insisted she use a sword to cut a cake and Kate couldn’t stop laughing
item.description: If you’ve got the opportunity to cut a cake with a giant ceremonial sword, then, of course, you’re going to take it – and that’s exactly what the Queen did in Cornwall on Friday.
item.dc:creator: Liam O'Dell

item.title: 10 touching tributes to The Wire actor Michael K Williams after he dies aged 54
item.description: Tributes have been pouring in forThe Wire actor Michael K Williams following his death aged 54.
item.dc:creator: Elaine McCallig

item.title: Here are 55 of the worst things Trump has done during his presidency
item.description: While in office, Donald Trump has been a very busy boy.
item.dc:creator: Moya Lothian McLean and Greg Evans

item.title: People are shocked to find themselves agreeing with Boris Johnson's thoughts on anti-vaxxers
item.description: It's rare that the British public (the part on Twitter, at least) finds itself agreeing with Boris Johnson, but his views on anti-vaxxers appears to have won widespread support.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: Alan Johnson's bizarre appearance on The Masked Singer compared to the 'end of Western civilisation'
item.description: We are only a few days into 2020 and its safe to say that it is already the weirdest and most confusing year of the century.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: Trump mocked after making a bizarre claim about excessive toilet flushing
item.description: Donald Trump is usually the butt of many jokes but he took that to new levels on Friday.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: Andrea Leadsom appears to struggle with the concept of where money comes from during BBC interview
item.description: Tory minister, Andrea Leadsom, has appeared on BBC Radio 4's Today Programme where she was asked questions about the government's intentions for business rates going forward and reducing the tax burden.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: A Who Wants to Be a Millionaire contestant won a huge prize because of his prosthetic leg
item.description: To succeed at Who Wants To Be A Millionaire you need to have an outstanding amount of general knowledge in your arsenal and also a stroke of luck.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: Everyone thought Aliens were invading last night - here's what it really was
item.description: On Friday night, SpaceX launched its latest rocket and caused a bit of a panic in Southern California and Arizona.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: 126 bikers escort teenage girl who had been bullied to her prom
item.description: A bullied teenage girl in County Durham who was terrified of going to prom was treated to the perfect escort to quell any of her fears.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: David Lammy calls Brexit 'a con, a trick, a swindle' in passionate Commons speech
item.description: Labour MP David Lammy has given one of the most passionate anti-Brexit speeches that the Commons has ever seen.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: Watch the moment a baby born deaf hears his mother for the first time
item.description: A deaf baby who has been granted the miracle of hearing has become a viral sensation thanks to his adorable reaction.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: How to correctly predict the Oscars, according to research
item.description: The 91st Academy Awards will take place on Sunday evening with all the stars of Hollywood descending on the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: Trump mocked with 'Art of the Deal' jokes after failed talks with Kim Jong-un
item.description: Donald Trump's momentous meeting with Kim Jong-un in Vietnam was supposed to be the crowning of one of the biggest deals that the president had ever cemented.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans

item.title: Extinction Rebellion: Jacob Rees-Mogg interviewed a climate change activist and it went exactly how you can imagine
item.description: This week parts of London have been brought to a standstill by climate change activists Extinction Rebellion, who are demanding that the government declares a 'climate change emergency'.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans
